directions.text: Marinate chicken for at least 30 mins with beer, oil, lemon juice, 4 tsp lemon pepper and ground pepper.
Cut onions into fourths lay on two foil sheets add butter and sprinkle 1 tsp lemon pepper on top.
Fold the foil over and poke holes in the top.
Cook everything on a grill, 20 mins for onions and 5 mins for each chicken side.
